original_text: Hezekiah received the envoys gladly and showed them what was in his storehouses—the silver, the gold, the spices, the fine olive oil—his entire armory and everything found among his treasures. There was nothing in his palace or in all his kingdom that Hezekiah did not show them.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들로 말미암아 기뻐하여 그들에게 보물 창고 곧 은금과 향료와 보배로운 기름과 모든 무기고에 있는 것을 다 보여 주었으니 히스기야가 궁중의 소유와 전 국내의 소유를 보이지 아니한 것이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: and showed them what was in his storehouses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 자신의 창고에 있는 것을 보여주었으니

sentences.original_text: the spices, the fine olive oil
and everything found among his treasures
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 보물들 사이에서 발견된 모든 것이었다

sentences.original_text: There was nothing in his palace
that Hezekiah did not show them
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야가 그들에게 보여주지 않은 것이 없었다
